plot outline: The movie is all about Vettrivel (Sathyaraj), a rich merchant in Coimbatore. His son Sakthivel (Sibiraj) helps his father in business and comes across Nikitha and falls in love. Meanwhile, Vettrivel gets his daughter married to a rich family in the village. Unfortunately they happen to be a gang of terrorists. Meanwhile, Vettrivel opposes his son's love. The rest is all but how Sakthivel brings an end to the terrorists and also succeeds in holdingthe hands of Nikitha.
title: Vetrivel Sakthivel
